params.account: address which the extended data will be calculated.

returns.data: extended accountability of all markets for the account.

params.assets: amount of assets that will be borrowed.

returns.previews: array containing amount plus yield that account will receive after each maturity.

params.assets: amount of assets that will be borrowed.
params.maturity: maturity date/pool where the assets will be borrowed.

returns._0: positionAssets amount plus fees that the depositor will repay at maturity.

params.assets: amount of assets that will be deposited.

returns.previews: array containing amount plus yield that account will receive after each maturity.

params.assets: amount of assets that will be deposited.
params.maturity: maturity date/pool where the assets will be deposited.

returns._0: amount plus yield that the depositor will receive after maturity.

params.maturity: maturity date/pool where the assets will be repaid.
params.positionAssets: amount of assets that will be subtracted from the position.

returns._0: repayAssets amount of assets that will be repaid.

params.maturity: maturity date/pool where the assets will be withdrawn.
params.positionAssets: amount of assets that will be tried to withdraw.

returns._0: withdrawAssets amount that will be withdrawn.

exactly(address).notice: Function to get a certain account extended data.

previewBorrowAtAllMaturities(address,uin.notice: Gets the assets plus fees offered by all VALID maturities when borrowing a certain amount.

previewBorrowAtMaturity(address,uint256,.notice: Gets the amount plus fees to be repaid at maturity when borrowing certain amount of assets.

previewDepositAtAllMaturities(address,ui.notice: Gets the assets plus yield offered by all VALID maturities when depositing a certain amount.

previewDepositAtMaturity(address,uint256.notice: Gets the assets plus yield offered by a maturity when depositing a certain amount.

previewRepayAtMaturity(address,uint256,u.notice: Gets the assets that will be repaid when repaying a certain amount at the current maturity.

previewWithdrawAtMaturity(address,uint25.notice: Gets the amount to be withdrawn for a certain positionAmount of assets at maturity.

userdoc.notice: Contract to be consumed by Exactly's front-end dApp.
